contact.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
contact.faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about contacting us
contact.emergency.title: 24/7 Emergency Support
contact.emergency.subtitle: Urgent assistance for existing bookings and emergencies
contact.locations.office1.name: Main Office - Colombo
contact.locations.office2.name: Airport Counter - CMB
contact.locations.office2.address: Arrival Hall, Bandaranaike International Airport, Katunayake
contact.locations.office3.name: Kandy City Office
contact.faq.q1.question: What is your response time for inquiries?
contact.faq.q1.answer: We respond to all inquiries within 2 hours during business hours. WhatsApp messages are answered instantly, and emails are replied within 2 hours.
contact.faq.q2.question: Do you provide 24/7 customer support?
contact.faq.q2.answer: Yes! Our main phone line and WhatsApp are available 24/7 for urgent matters, especially for existing bookings and airport transfers.
contact.faq.q3.question: What information should I provide when contacting?
contact.faq.q3.answer: Please include your travel dates, number of travelers, preferred destinations, and any specific requirements. This helps us provide accurate recommendations quickly.
contact.faq.q4.question: Can I modify my booking after confirmation?
contact.faq.q4.answer: Yes, modifications are possible based on availability. Contact us immediately for any changes. Please refer to our cancellation policy for details.
contact.faq.q5.question: Do you have English-speaking staff?
contact.faq.q5.answer: All our staff are fluent in English. We also have team members who speak French, German, and Chinese to assist international travelers.

about.pageTitle: About Zamzam Lanka Tours | Sri Lanka's Premier Tour Operator
about.metaDescription: Learn about ZamZam Tours ‚Äî our mission, team, values and approach to delivering authentic Sri Lankan experiences.
about.hero.subtitle: Authentic, sustainable journeys crafted by local experts who put safety and meaningful experiences first.
about.hero.alt: Zamzam Lanka Tours team in Sri Lanka
about.mission.ourMission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.ourMission.paragraph: To provide exceptional, personalized travel experiences that showcase the true essence of Sri Lanka while maintaining the highest standards of service, safety, and sustainability.
about.mission.ourVision.title: Our Vision
about.mission.ourVision.paragraph: To be Sri Lanka's most trusted and innovative tour operator, recognized for creating meaningful connections between travelers and local culture while driving positive impact in our communities.
about.approach.step1.title: Personalized Planning
about.approach.step1.text: We listen to your preferences and craft custom itineraries that match your travel style.
about.approach.step2.title: Local Expertise
about.approach.step2.text: Our deep local knowledge ensures you experience authentic Sri Lanka beyond the tourist trails.
about.approach.step3.title: Seamless Execution
about.approach.step3.text: From airport pickup to departure, every detail is managed for a hassle-free experience.
about.approach.step4.title: Continuous Support
about.approach.step4.text: 24/7 assistance throughout your journey ensures peace of mind and immediate problem-solving.
about.values.title: Our Values & Principles
about.values.subtitle: The foundation of everything we do at Zamzam Lanka Tours
about.values.items.0.title: Trust & Reliability
about.values.items.0.description: We build long-term relationships based on trust, delivering exactly what we promise every time.
about.values.items.1.title: Personalized Service
about.values.items.1.description: Every itinerary is customized to match your preferences, pace, and travel style.
about.values.items.2.title: Sustainable Tourism
about.values.items.2.description: We support local communities and promote eco-friendly practices in all our operations.
about.values.items.3.title: Quality Excellence
about.values.items.3.description: From vehicles to guides, we maintain the highest standards to ensure your comfort and satisfaction.
about.values.items.4.title: Cultural Respect
about.values.items.4.description: We help you experience Sri Lankan culture authentically while respecting local traditions.
about.values.items.5.title: Safety First
about.values.items.5.description: Your safety is our top priority, with well-maintained vehicles and experienced professionals.
about.team.title: Meet Our Expert Team
about.team.subtitle: Passionate professionals dedicated to making your Sri Lankan journey unforgettable
about.team.members.0.quote: Our mission is to create unforgettable Sri Lankan experiences that connect people with our rich culture and natural beauty.
about.cta.title: Ready to Experience Sri Lanka with Us?
about.cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied travelers who have discovered the magic of Sri Lanka through our expert guidance
